Title: An ingenious treatment
Content: ‘Ashad Ka Ek Din” written by Mohan Rakesh is a modern classic which has been translated into most of the Indian languages and frequently performed by leading theatre practitioners as well as by amateu
Author: Diwan Singh Bajeli
Description: ‘Ashad Ka Ek Din” written by Mohan Rakesh is a modern classic which has been translated into most of the Indian languages and frequently performed by leading theatre practitioners as well as by amateu
